Arizona Winter School 2018: Iwasawa Theory

AWS 2018 will be held March 3-7, 2018 at the University of Arizona in Tucson, AZ.

Please note that AWS 2018 is being held one week earlier relative to previous Winter Schools due to a recent change in the University of Arizona academic calendar. This change will affect future Winter Schools as well, so the dates for AWS 2019 will be March 2-6, 2019 (two weeks earlier relative to tradition). Please refer to University of Arizona academic calendars for future years. (The AWS begins on the first day of the University of Arizona's Spring Recess in any given year.)

  • The deadline to apply for funding was November 10, 2017. The deadline to register was December 10, 2017.
  • Schedule and other important information
  • Local directions
  • Organizers: Mirela Ciperiani and Romyar Sharifi (main program), with Alina Bucur, Bryden Cais, and David Zureick-Brown
  • Funded by the National Science Foundation and organized in partnership with the Clay Mathematics Institute.
